community_integrations.name: Veracode_Delete_Sandbox
community_integrations.description: A simple example script to delete a Sandbox if it exists in a Veracode application profile and you have the appropriate permissions.

community_integrations.name: Bulk add teams to workspaces
community_integrations.description: Allows for adding teams to workspaces in bulk.

community_integrations.name: Check Build Status
community_integrations.description: Script to check if an application profile in Veracode has a build running currently.  It also provides an option to delete the build if there is one running.

community_integrations.name: Check Pass Fail
community_integrations.description: A simple example script to check pass/fail status of a Veracode app profile (or sandbox) or for a list of app profiles with out sandboxes.

community_integrations.name: VcodeAutoMitigate
community_integrations.description: Command line app that mitigates flaws in Veracode based on CWE, scan type, and specific text in the description.

community_integrations.name: VcodeMitigationExpire
community_integrations.description: Utility designed to be run on a regular cadence (e.g., weekly cron job) to expire mitigations. The types of mitigations, expiration references, and other settings are controlled in a JSON config file.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Break the Build by Severity
community_integrations.description: This project contains three python scripts useful for working with Veracode projects in a build pipeline to break the build if any findings of a given severity or higher are found.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Create List of Sandboxes
community_integrations.description: This plugin creates a list of sandboxes in all available application profiles.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Get All SBOMs
community_integrations.description: Allows for bulk generation of SBOM json files. It works for both US and EU instances and has support for Upload and Scan and Agent-based scan.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Get Single SBOM
community_integrations.description: Gets the SBOM for a single Application Profile or Workspace/Project pair.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Mitigation Copier
community_integrations.description: Copies mitigations from one Veracode profile to another if it's the same flaw based on the following flaw attributes: issueid, cweid, type, sourcefile, and line. The script will copy all proposed and accepted mitigations for the flaw. The script will skip a flaw in the copy_to build if it already has an accepted mitigation.

community_integrations.name: Veracode PDF Reports
community_integrations.description: Pulls latest PDF reports from Veracode for recent Static and Dynamic scans.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Policy Examples
community_integrations.description: A collection of example application security "policies as code" that can be added to your Veracode organization account.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Promote Named Sandbox
community_integrations.description: This will promote the latest scan of a named sandbox.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Sandbox Mitigated Unique Findings
community_integrations.description: This script will pull all open findings across all sandboxes for all applications and calculate which mitigated (proposed, accepted, or rejected) findings only exist in a single sandbox, and therefore may be deleted when the sandbox is deleted.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Scan Counts
community_integrations.description: Identify Veracode application profiles with one or more static scans in an incomplete state.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Workspace Auto Create
community_integrations.description: Uses the Veracode Agent Based Scan API and other Veracode REST APIs to automatically create a workspace for application profiles in a Veracode organization.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Delete Sandboxes via Threshold
community_integrations.description: Java Script that will automatically delete Sandboxes from a profile via a configured threshold and the number of Sandboxes to be deleted.

community_integrations.name: JavaScript Auto Packager
community_integrations.description: CLI tool to automatically package a `JavaScript` application for Veracode Static Analysis

community_integrations.name: Go Auto Packager
community_integrations.description: CLI tool to automatically package a `Golang` application for Veracode Static Analysis

community_integrations.name: .NET Auto Packager
community_integrations.description: CLI tool to automatically package a `.NET` application for Veracode Static Analysis

community_integrations.name: Bamboo
community_integrations.description: full featured Bamboo plugin including configuration UI, wait for scan to complete, and "break the build" functionality

community_integrations.name: Bamboo-Jira
community_integrations.description: provides a pair of simple plugins for upload and results handling from within Bamboo, and a lightweight script to create Jira issues (archived project)

community_integrations.name: Bash-CircleCI
community_integrations.description: Veracode Upload and Scan Bash Script, originally written for CircleCI but can be used for any build system that can run a shell script in bash.

community_integrations.name: Bitrise-step-veracode-scan
community_integrations.description: add Veracode scanning to Bitrise CI.

community_integrations.name: CircleCI
community_integrations.description: Example configurations for building a project with Maven, then executing policy scan, agent-based SCA, and pipeline scan in a CircleCI pipeline.

community_integrations.name: CircleCI
community_integrations.description: Example configuration for zipping a project, then executing policy scan, agent-based SCA, and pipeline scan in a CircleCI pipeline.

community_integrations.name: Exemplos Veracode
community_integrations.description: In this repository you will find several examples for Veracode implementations created by the [M3Corp](https://github.com/M3Corp-Community) team. In the [Pipelines](https://github.com/M3Corp-Community/Veracode/tree/main/Pipelines) folder you can find how to implement in the most diverse CI/CD tools, such as [Azure](https://github.com/M3Corp-Community/Veracode/tree/main/Pipelines/Az%20DevOps), [GitLab](https://github.com/M3Corp-Community/Veracode/tree/main/Pipelines/GitLab), [GitHub Actions](https://github.com/M3Corp-Community/Veracode/tree/main/Pipelines/GitHub%20Actions) and [Jenkins](https://github.com/M3Corp-Community/Veracode/tree/main/Pipelines/Jenkins). Other implementation examples such as running in a [terminal](https://github.com/M3Corp-Community/Veracode/tree/main/SOs) and [translating the results](https://github.com/M3Corp-Community/Veracode/tree/main/FreeStyle) are also available. We normally publish in Portuguese, but the examples are completely understandable in other languages

community_integrations.name: Jenkins (Jenkins Shell)
community_integrations.description: unofficial Veracode shell integration for Jenkins Freestyle projects.

community_integrations.name: veracode-badges
community_integrations.description: produces badges for READMEs and other artifact repositories showing the status of Veracode policy scans.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Community SAST Azure DevOps Extension
community_integrations.description: Seamlessly integrate Veracode SAST scans with Azure DevOps build pipelines (using Pipeline Scan).

community_integrations.name: veracode-serverless-webhooks
community_integrations.description: enables Veracode customers who want to use the Veracode Upload-and-Scan Static and SCA (not the Pipeline or the IDE scans) and get updates back in an asynchronous manner.

community_integrations.name: Verademo
community_integrations.description: custom fork of Verademo, featuring sample pipeline configurations for Bitbucket, Jenkins and Azure Pipelines.

community_integrations.name: XebiaLabs Release Veracode Plugin
community_integrations.description: XL Release for Veracode test automation.

community_integrations.name: veracode-yml-sample-pipelines
community_integrations.description: example YML files for Azure DevOps, Jenkins, GitLab, CircleCI. Pipelines include Veracode SCA Agent scans, Veracode Static Analysis policy and pipeline scans.

community_integrations.name: veracode-aws-documentation
community_integrations.description: How to setup an AWS CodeSuite with Veracode Static Analysis, Software Composition Analysis, and Dynamic Analysis.

community_integrations.name: veracode-examples
community_integrations.description: This repository contains veracode examples in the form of use cases that can be run in end-user environments. Kubernetes. AWS CodePipeline. CircleCi to GCP Functions. Multi-tiered application leveraging various languages.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Azure YML Samples
community_integrations.description: Samples of Azure YML files that work with Veracode scanning

community_integrations.name: Veracode Community SCA Azure DevOps Extension
community_integrations.description: Seamlessly integrate Veracode Agent-Based SCA scans with Azure DevOps build or release pipelines.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Dynamic Analysis Azure Sample
community_integrations.description: Veracode Dynamic Analysis Azure Sample including script based authentication, and ISM configuration.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Flaw Importer
community_integrations.description: GitHub Action to import static policy findings to GitHub Security Code Scanning Alerts.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Flaw Importer Postprocessing
community_integrations.description: Plugin made to run after the regular import to update the work items with an assigned user and a linked Work Item.

community_integrations.name: Veracode for Azure DevOps Pipelines
community_integrations.description: Yaml files to get started with Veracode on Azure DevOps. Accompanies this [blog post](https://community.veracode.com/s/blog/user-story-how-we-set-up-veracode-in-a-large-azure-project-MCT4HNONEE55CIFA6O3ULXNUW2BI).

community_integrations.name: Azure DevOps Pipeline-Scan plugin
community_integrations.description: This plugin should make it easier to run the Veracode pipeline scan on Azure DevOps pipelines. The full scan jar is included within the plugin and don't need to be downloaded each time when the pipeline runs. In addition it will populate an additional tab on your pipeline run to display results in a more convinient way. The plugin will automatically update itself every night if a new version of the piepline scan jar is published.

community_integrations.name: SCA Findings to Work Items
community_integrations.description: Saves new Veracode SCA findings as Azure DevOps Work Items.

community_integrations.name: Azure DevOps promote scan
community_integrations.description: This repository contains Azure DevOps scripts that can be referenced and used for integration with Veracode Analysis tools.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Application Sandboxes Helper
community_integrations.description: An Action to handle Sandboxes mainly as a set of clean-up activities such as: deleting a sandbox and promoting Sandbox scan to Policy Scan with or without deleting the sandbox

community_integrations.name: Gradle
community_integrations.description: Set of Gradle tasks, usable either as a command line submission tool or integrated as part of a continuous integration build process, to perform Veracode submission for applications and scan results for flaws.

community_integrations.name: Sbt-veracode
community_integrations.description: sbt plugin for Veracode.

community_integrations.name: VSCode-Veracode
community_integrations.description: a plugin for Visual Studio Code that enables integration with Veracode Static Analysis. Currently, this only supports flaw download, but will be enhanced to support upload as well in the future.

community_integrations.name: vsccode-veracode-sca
community_integrations.description: A very simple plugin for Veracode SCA to get agent-base SCA results into VSCode IDE.

community_integrations.name: unofficial-vs-code-veracode-pipeline-scan
community_integrations.description: Scan an app with Veracode Pipeline Scan, and load results from a Veracode Pipeline Scan. [Link to the plugin in VSCode marketplace](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ctcampbell-com.unofficial-vs-code-veracode)

community_integrations.name: Veracode Unified Plugin Unofficial Version
community_integrations.description: VSCode plugin which integrate with the Veracode platform and enables downloading of scan results (findings) for both Static and SCA (Upload-and-Scan), run pipeline scan, and submit mitigations [Link to the plugin in VSCode marketplace](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=YaakovLerer.veracode)

community_integrations.name: Jetbrains family plugin
community_integrations.description: Compliments Veracode's official IntelliJ IDE integration with support for other Jetbrains IDE products. It enables you to download the SAST result from Veracode Platform into your Jetbrains IDE.

community_integrations.name: Insomnia
community_integrations.description: Adds an HMAC authentication header to Veracode API requests in Insomnia.

community_integrations.name: Veracode-Postman
community_integrations.description: Pre-request authentication script and instructions for accessing Veracode APIs from Postman.

community_integrations.name: Ansible
community_integrations.description: allows uploading and scanning with Veracode from Ansible, with an option to send results to a Slack channel

community_integrations.name: Flowdock
community_integrations.description: Utility designed to be run in a build process after a Veracode scan to notify a Flowdock flow that the scan completed. Optional to include policy compliance info in notification.

community_integrations.name: PowerShell
community_integrations.description: PowerShell script for pushing binaries to Veracode using Java API.

community_integrations.name: Slack
community_integrations.description: AWS Lambda commands that provide the ability to access Veracode application and build information from Slack.

community_integrations.name: SonarQube
community_integrations.description: Unofficial Veracode plugin for SonarQube.

community_integrations.name: Veracode QuickScan
community_integrations.description: PHP example of how to connect to the APIs, scan a couple of files and get results.

community_integrations.name: veracode-tools
community_integrations.description: Docker image with all Veracode tools pre-installed.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Upload and Scan Shell Script
community_integrations.description: A shell script to upload and scan a application (zip or war etc.) and create the application if necessary. Uses Curl and hmac headers.

community_integrations.name: Pipeline2DetailedReport
community_integrations.description: translate Veracode Pipeline Scan results into DetailedReport XML format, allowing you to import them into an IDE plugin for remediation.

community_integrations.name: pipeline2html
community_integrations.description: run a Veracode Pipeline Scan and generate a human-readable .HTML file from the Veracode pipeline verification results.json file.

community_integrations.name: Pipeline2JUnitXml
community_integrations.description: reads the JSON output of a Veracode Pipeline Scan and converts it into a standard JUnit test results XML file.

community_integrations.name: PipelineResultsCompare
community_integrations.description: checks if there are any issues present on a pipeline results file that aren't present on another, supporting filtering by severity.

community_integrations.name: veracode-pipeline-PR-comment
community_integrations.description: Sends output of Pipeline Scan to a comment on a pull request.

community_integrations.name: veracode-pipeline-with-baseline
community_integrations.description: GitHub Action to perform a Veracode Pipeline Scan and, optionally, compare the results against a set of baseline results.

community_integrations.name: veracode-da-reset-scheduler
community_integrations.description: Resets all recurrent scheduled analysis jobs configured for one year that have expired.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Dynamic Analysis Examples
community_integrations.description: Dynamic Analysis API Examples.  Currently includes example code for using the Scanner Variables feature, where credentials can be defined and updated at the account level, and referenced in Selenium login scripts.

community_integrations.name: Veracode DAST Add bulk urls to blocklist
community_integrations.description: Adds a list of urls to the blocklist for an existing DAST scan.

community_integrations.name: yarn-v2-workspaces-helper
community_integrations.description: Creates yarn.lock files for each workspace to make the whole project scannable with Veracode's SCA solution. this is specifically for yarn version 2 and lower

community_integrations.name: yarn-v3-workspaces-helper
community_integrations.description: Creates yarn.lock files for each workspace to make the whole project scannable with Veracode's SCA solution. this is specifically for yarn version 3 and higher

community_integrations.name: Excel (XLS)
community_integrations.description: Python scripts to format Veracode XML results into Excel workbook formats for easier human consumption.

community_integrations.name: (XLSX)
community_integrations.description: Python scripts to format Veracode XML results into Excel workbook formats for easier human consumption.

community_integrations.name: Generate License Notice file
community_integrations.description: Python script that creates a License Notice file (sometimes called an Attribution Report) for an application that has been scanned by Veracode SCA.

community_integrations.name: Generate SBOM
community_integrations.description: Python script to generate a Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) for an application in either CycloneDX or SPDX format.

community_integrations.name: Hygieia
community_integrations.description: Veracode scan collector and parser for the [Hygieia dashboard](https://github.com/Hygieia/ExecDashboard).

community_integrations.name: JupiterOne Graph Veracode
community_integrations.description: A graph conversion tool for Veracode.

community_integrations.name: SCA Extractor
community_integrations.description: Creates a CSV file with open source vulnerability (SCA) findings for all builds in the input file.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Container Scan results to HTML
community_integrations.description: Converts the JSON output of a Veracode container scan into HTML.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Scan Compare
community_integrations.description: Use this tool to compare two Veracode Static Analysis (SAST) scans to understand why they are different.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Scan Health
community_integrations.description: Produces a SAST scan health report with guidance on changes to make in order to improve the packaging and module selection to achieve greater flaw accuracy.

community_integrations.name: Stats
community_integrations.description: Summary statistics for a Veracode account on the command line.

community_integrations.name: VeraData
community_integrations.description: Console application that will retrieve data (all scans, flaws, mitigations etc) for a given AppId and store the results in a relational schema (only supports MSSQL Server currently) ready for plugging your favourite BI tool into!

community_integrations.name: VeraCustomTriage
community_integrations.description: App that generates a .xlsx remediation plan from a set of scan results augmented with text from JSON configuration files. Custom text is added when flaw criteria is met (such as a CWE ID, module name, file or line number). This allows custom text such as internal workflows, wiki links, training, code snippets, 2nd party information or other languages into the auto generated remediation plan. Enables app sec teams to triage large volumes of flaws quickly whilst sharing a core advice repository in code.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Report Converter (CSV)
community_integrations.description: .NET Framework utility to extract useful data from Detailed Report XML file into CSV format

community_integrations.name: Veracode Report Converter Portable (CSV)
community_integrations.description: .NET Core utility to extract useful data from Detailed Report XML file into CSV format

community_integrations.name: Veracode Gitlab SCA results report and issue generation
community_integrations.description: Rewrites Veracode's Agent Based SCA json results in Gitlab readable report format in (orde)r to display results as dependency scanning on the pipeline run

community_integrations.name: Veracode Gitlab static results report and issue generation
community_integrations.description: A little Java Script will download json results from a Veracode policy or sandbox scan into Gitlab readable report format in order display results as SAST results on the pipeline run and create Gitlab issues on the findings

community_integrations.name: veracode-to-csv
community_integrations.description: This script outputs one CSV file per scan per application profile visible in a Veracode platform account. The output can be imported into  Splunk for further analysis.

community_integrations.name: VCCLI
community_integrations.description: Veracode AST and Security Labs utility in .NET Core.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Container Security Display (Unofficial)
community_integrations.description: Display, sort and filter Container Security JSON results.

community_integrations.name: TopDesk
community_integrations.description: Integration with ITSM | CSC | ESM tool called [TopDesk](https://www.topdesk.com/).

community_integrations.name: Azure AD SAML SSO Autocreating teams
community_integrations.description: Code and documentation on configuring Azure Active Directory to automatically create teams as part of the just-in-time provisioning workflow via SAML.

community_integrations.name: Veracode API Credentials Expiry
community_integrations.description: A simple example to get the exiration dates of api credentials for your users.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Get User List
community_integrations.description: Get a list of users with their attributes.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Offboard
community_integrations.description: Deactivates a provided list of users on the Veracode Platform.

community_integrations.name: Veracode User Bulk Role Assign
community_integrations.description: Uses the Veracode Identity API to add roles (Security Labs User, Greenlight IDE User, or eLearning) to existing users.

community_integrations.name: Veracode UM Powershell Tool
community_integrations.description: A completed User management tool write in Powershell using the Veracode APIs. You can use to create, block, delete and update users, in Windows, Linux or Mac terminal. This a simplified and translated version from the original in [Portuguese](https://github.com/IGDEXE/Veracode-UM).

community_integrations.name: Veracode UM Powershell Tool in Portuguese
community_integrations.description: A completed User management tool write in Powershell using the Veracode APIs. This version is completed in Portuguese, and you can use to create, block, delete and update users, in Windows, Linux or Mac terminal.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Archer
community_integrations.description: Script to export a Veracode Archer report file to disk. Usage: set on a timer and run daily or weekly, then import the results into RSA Archer.

community_integrations.name: auth.js
community_integrations.description: Veracode custom HMAC request signing algorithm (used for API authorization), written in JavaScript -- uses Web Crypto API instead of the Node Crypto library

community_integrations.name: PythonHMAC
community_integrations.description: simple example of usage of the Veracode API signing library provided in the Veracode Help Center

community_integrations.name: NodeJS
community_integrations.description: NodeJS lib, written in JavaScript, to generate authorization header with Veracode API Key and ID. Sample usage in the comment of the gist

community_integrations.name: vcodeHMAC
community_integrations.description: Go package that creates an authorization header using Veracode API Key and ID.

community_integrations.name: vcodeHMAC-CLI
community_integrations.description: CLI tool to generate an authorization header for Veracode APIs using API ID and Key. Given an HTTP method and URL, and the location of your Veracode API credentials file, you will get the value of an Authorization header printed out for piping into curl, httpie, or other scripting uses.

community_integrations.name: veracode-go-hmac-authentication
community_integrations.description: A simple Go package that follows the format of the existing HMAC Authentication Examples found in the [Veracode Help Center](https://docs.veracode.com/r/c_hmac_signing_example_c_sharp).

community_integrations.name: Veracode_HMAC_Auth
community_integrations.description: A PowerShell example for doing HMAC authentication to the Veracode APIs.

community_integrations.name: Using curl and openssl to access the Veracode API endpoint
community_integrations.description: short article illustrating use of built-in shell tools to handle HMAC signing and send API requests from the command line.

community_integrations.name: .NET Core Nuget Package Wrapper
community_integrations.description: C# NuGet package that wraps XML APIs

community_integrations.name: Go wrapper
community_integrations.description: Wrapper written in Go for easy use of Veracode APIs

community_integrations.name: node-veracode-api-client
community_integrations.description: Node.js API client.

community_integrations.name: veracode-api (Ruby)
community_integrations.description: Ruby Wrapper for the Veracode API.

community_integrations.name: veracode-api-clients
community_integrations.description: Client code using the Veracode REST and XML APIs. Includes handlers for Veracode Dynamic Analysis scanning.

community_integrations.name: veracode-api-py
community_integrations.description: Python helper library for working with the Veracode APIs. Handles retries, pagination, and other features of the modern Veracode REST APIs.

community_integrations.name: Bash shell
community_integrations.description: Bash script for scanning a directory of code with the Veracode platform.

community_integrations.name: F5 WAF
community_integrations.description: Transforms Veracode dynamic result files into the F5 generic scanner result format for import into the F5 web application firewall.

community_integrations.name: verapi
community_integrations.description: Lambda function for automating Veracode static scans

community_integrations.name: veracode-api (Node)
community_integrations.description: Node.js package for automating Veracode scanning from the command line.

community_integrations.name: Veracode-cli
community_integrations.description: Automated way to check application status and DevSecops compliance.

community_integrations.name: Veracode Notifier
community_integrations.description: Lambda function that sends a message to a web hook, for instance for use with Slack

community_integrations.name: VeraHooks Mitigation Webhooks
community_integrations.description: React .NET Core solution for creating custom webhooks that watch application profiles and trigger when mitigations meet specified conditions.

community_integrations.name: Secure cryptography examples for Java
community_integrations.description: Code samples showing how to use the Java Crypto API securely. Accompanying code for the [Java Crypto blog series](https://www.veracode.com/blog/research/how-get-started-using-java-cryptography-securely).

community_integrations.name: VeraDemo
community_integrations.description: Sample insecure application written in Java and Javascript, showing vulnerabilities in realistic Java code.

community_integrations.name: VeraDemoAPI
community_integrations.description: Sample insecure application written in Javascript, showing vulnerabilities in realistic Javascript code.

community_integrations.name: VeraDemoJava
community_integrations.description: Sample insecure application written in Java, showing vulnerabilities in realistic Java code.

community_integrations.name: VeraDemoDocker
community_integrations.description: Bringing the 2 demo apps above VeraDemoJave and VeraDemoAPI together and start them within a docker environment. You will get a Java Web Application, a JavaScript node express API. a MySQL database and a vulnerable container.

community_integrations.name: NodeGoat
community_integrations.description: NodeGoat, built w/CircleCI, showing how to use a yaml file to scan w/Veracode.

community_integrations.name: Security Labs Scripts
community_integrations.description: Python scripts to automate various administrative tasks in Veracode Security Labs.
